channel.title: Mopar Server Status Checker (Program)
channel.description:
i created this cause i was awlays annoied before i hopped on any server and the server would be temp offline on mopar. so i created this to tell me before i log on and waste my time
its Just Basicly a Program That Detects if someones server is online on mopar or offline
resources: windows sidebar weather images , nintendo wii homebrew themesong. and some codeing
images: [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/8186/checker.png[/img]
Download link: http://www.mediafire.com/?awp78p2p8t2tu0h
V2 is Comeing Soon. Will Support The Following Websites. Moparscape ServerStatusPage *adding more soon*
Virus Scan: http://www.virustotal.com/file-scan/report.html?id=86dbbab8caef7349217b4f5d2f35101ca180d6ab5d9d94425d4818c429b1498c-1293820249
Source: http://www.mediafire.com/?t5uwebyq3svav25 Please Give Credits To Me If You Are Going To Post Program

item.title: Mopar Server Status Checker (Program)
item.dc:creator: @wurz1l wurz1l
item.description:
@wurz1l wrote:

Who would download this when it’s already on the server status page that you’re viewing…

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar Server Status Checker (Program)
item.dc:creator: @PeeHPee PeeHPee
item.description:
@PeeHPee wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:22, topic:375968”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=471902.msg3452781#msg3452781 date=1293869741]

I don’t understand the proudness you’re feeling. Because all you did was grab an image, you didn’t truly check whether the server was online/offline and it’s dependent upon other resources (meaning if mopar goes off, this won’t work)

Because this program checks the server statuses on other websites, right?
[/quote]What is this implying?

This is obviously a program that retrieves the status of a server posted on the MoparScape server status page. So what are you trying to imply with this:[quote](meaning if mopar goes off, this won’t work)
[/quote][/quote]

the application relies on moparisthebest.com’s server status to check the status of a server, if moparisthebest.com goes down due to hardware failure/being attacked/whatever then this program will cease to function for the remainder of the time that moparisthebest.com stays down.

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar Server Status Checker (Program)
item.dc:creator: @lotto320 lotto320
item.description:
@lotto320 wrote:

/facepalm/facepalm/facepalm/facepalm/facepalm/facepalm/facepalm/facepalm/facepalm/facepalm/facepalm
LOL i laughed when i readed all of these quotes together:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:375968”]Because you can’t just type that into your browser? ;)[/quote][quote=“gooasco, post:11, topic:375968”]no tis just a simple program you just have to open it then simply type in the ip
then it will tell you if the server is online or offline

uploading source
*edit: its nice to finaly have the admin post on one of my posts

ok here is the source
http://www.mediafire.com/?t5uwebyq3svav25

you also have permission to say wow. just one line of text runs the program LOL

if youd like to post this somewhere please give credits to me LOL[/quote]

[quote=“gooasco, post:9, topic:375968”]sure i guess. its just basicly 1 code. when you press the button all it does is

PictureBox2.ImageLocation = ("http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/" + TextBox1.Text + ".png")

give me a minuet[/quote]

I don’t understand the proudness you’re feeling. Because all you did was grab an image, you didn’t truly check whether the server was online/offline and it’s dependent upon other resources (meaning if mopar goes off, this won’t work)

Because this program checks the server statuses on other websites, right?
[/quote]What is this implying?[/quote]
This is obviously a program that retrieves the status of a server posted on the MoparScape server status page. So what are you trying to imply with this:

(meaning if mopar goes off, this won’t work)

i will try to add a checker for other server spots. stay out on this page for v2.

dont get me wrong. i love mopar. not hate.

item.title: Mopar Server Status Checker (Program)
item.dc:creator: @gooasco gooasco
item.description:
@gooasco wrote:

in the image , on every server page itll have an image. so what i did is copy the bbc code url and cut out the ip. so when the ip in insert it will tell you if it is online or offline. and im really not that proud. im just happy that im spreading it.

im just basicly makeing it easier for other private server players to check if they can go online the game.
and if mopar does go off then the program is no longer valid.

Read full topic
